My Story

Building Better Financial Futures

I'm Jenna Lombardo, and I specialize in helping artists and creative professionals make better financial decisions. With over 20 years of experience and a CPA background, I understand the unique challenges of creative businesses—from irregular income streams to gallery consignments.

My journey began at Bryant University with a unique blend of accounting and psychology. This combination, enhanced by my MBA from the University of Hartford, allows me to understand not just the numbers, but the people behind them.

As a mother of three, I built my practice to offer flexibility while maintaining excellence. I genuinely love organizing messy books—it's not just about the numbers, but about helping your business reach its true potential.

"

"We have been working with Jenna and Ace Accountable Bookkeeping for over a year now, and we cannot be happier. Our business has been in operation for over 6 years, and our QuickBooks knowledge was all self-taught, so needless to say, the books were a mess when we decided to hire Ace Accountable Bookkeeping. We specifically work with the owner Jenna Lombardo who is very knowledgeable, detail oriented, responsive to all of our questions and patient. Jenna has what we managed to mess up throughout the years, and got us on track and into a mess free future. Her comprehensive monthly reports allow us to see our profit/loss easily, as well as our expense trends month over month and year over year. As we continue to grow, so does our partnership with Ace Accountable Bookkeeping; they allow us to focus on what we do best, while they focus on the rest."

JB

Jenn Barber

Business Owner

"

"Jenna Lombardo and team at Ace Accountables are a first class team. I have been using their services for the past 6 years and find them to be professional and thorough in all my needs. Jenna took what was a disaster of books and shaped them up in just a few weeks, put us onto QuickBooks Online and a bill paying system that made my job quick and easy. Most important the work is always accurate to the penny. Each month we receive a comprehensive financial report including all aspects of our financial health. Truly a class act and a benefit to all who partake of their service."

It's helped me easily see profit and loss more clearly, and I've even won several grants which wouldn't have been possible without detailed books. Jenna's services continue to grow with us as our needs expand, which for a small startup is so important."
